result.arabic_text: قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي ٱصۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَٰلَٰتِي وَبِكَلَٰمِي فَخُذۡ مَآ ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
result.translation: Imana Allah Yabwiye Musa Iti: “Jewe mu vy’ukuri, Naragutoye mu bantu Ndakurungikana ubutumwa bwanje ngo ububashikirize, Ndanavugana na we ukuri kwamye. Kubera ivyo rero, fata nkama ivyo Naguhaye uvyubahirize, uheze ube mu bashima”.
